title: W.B Yeats: a tribute
creator_credit: John Desmond Sheridan, George Fleischmann and National Film Institute of Ireland
brief_description: The life story of the Irish poet, William Butler Yeats, is told against scenes of places which influenced his life and work, including his home county of Sligo and the Abbey Theatre in Dublin. Relevant quotations from his poems are read to create an impression of the man and his work.
